name: Monatomic
description:
Fossil Fuels ran low. Helium wasn't flammable enough... Solar Panels were composed of photovoltaic cells that converted sunlight into electricity. Over time, Solar Panels broke down releasing toxic materials, such as lead into the ecosystem. Thus, landfills full of new environmental hazards formed. Wind turbines couldn't be built and operated on a large enough scale without fossil fuels. Neither solar nor wind power could sustain a lasting economy.

In an effort to save humanity, one scientist, Dr. Douglas Bones, has discovered the next step in humanity's evolution.

A game made in 2 weeks by DaBOUYS.

Notes:

Enter pauses/unpauses the game, although there isn't a pause menu.
